00038 Champ_front_calc_interne::Champ_front_calc_interne()
00039 {
00040   set_distant(0);
00041 }

00076 //! Lit le nom d'un champ inconnue a partir d'un flot d'entree.<br>Cree ensuite le champ de frontiere correspondant qui mettra en relation les deux<br>cotes de la frontiere interne.<br>Format:<br>Champ_front_calc_interne nom_pb nom_bord nom_champ
00077 /** \return Entree\&<br>
00078 Signification: le flot d'entree modifie<br>

00081 {

00084 #endif
00085 
00086   Champ_front_calc::readOn(is);
00087   return is;

00090 void Champ_front_calc_interne::completer()
00091 {
00092 #ifdef MEDCOUPLING_
00093   using namespace MEDCoupling;
00094 
00095   Champ_front_calc::completer();
00096 
00097 // Get barycenters of the concerned faces:
00098   const Front_VF& fvf = ref_cast(Front_VF, front_dis());
00099   const Zone_VF& zvf = ref_cast(Zone_VF, fvf.zone_dis());
00100   const DoubleTab& xv = zvf.xv();
00101   int nbfaces = fvf.nb_faces();
00102 
00103   if (nbfaces % 2)
00104     {
00105       Cerr << "ERROR : Champ_front_calc_interne::completer() - number of faces of the internal boundary is not even!"<< finl;
00106       Process::exit(1);
00107     }
00108   face_map_.resize(nbfaces,Array_base::NOCOPY_NOINIT);
00109 
00110   if (nbfaces>0)
00111     {
00112       const int ndim = xv.dimension(1);
00113       MCAuto<DataArrayDouble> coo(DataArrayDouble::New());
00114       coo->alloc(nbfaces, ndim);
00115 
00116       for (int i = 0; i < nbfaces; i++)
00117         {
00118           int num_f = fvf.num_face(i);
00119 
00120           for (int d = 0; d < ndim; d++)
00121             coo->setIJSilent(i, d, xv(num_f, d));
00122         }
00123 
00124       DataArrayInt *cP, *cIP;
00125       coo->findCommonTuples(Objet_U::precision_geom, 0, cP, cIP);
00126       int nb_faces_dup = cP->getNumberOfTuples();
00127       if (nb_faces_dup == nbfaces)
00128         {
00129 // Faces dupliquees -> singularite au niveau du gap
00130           MCAuto<DataArrayInt> dsi(cIP->deltaShiftIndex());
00131 
00132           if (!dsi->isUniform(2))
00133             {
00134               Cerr << "ERROR : Problem on internal boundary. Some face(s) not duplicated." << finl;
00135               Process::exit(1);
00136             }
00137 
00138           const int *p(cP->begin());
00139           for (int i = 0; i < nbfaces / 2; i++, p += 2)
00140             {
00141               face_map_(*p) = *(p + 1);
00142               face_map_(*(p + 1)) = *p;
00143             }
00144         }
00145       else
00146         {
00147 // Gap de dimension non-nulle -> on cherche le point
00148 // d'en face le plus proche
00149           const DoubleVect& face_surfaces = zvf.face_surfaces();
00150           MCAuto<DataArrayDouble> fnorm(DataArrayDouble::New());
00151           fnorm->alloc(nbfaces, 1);
00152           fnorm->fillWithZero();
00153 
00154           double* pfnorm = fnorm->getPointer();
00155 
00156           for (int i = 0; i < nbfaces; i++)
00157             {
00158               int num_f = fvf.num_face(i);
00159 
00160               for (int d = 0; d < ndim; d++)
00161                 {
00162                   pfnorm[i]+=zvf.face_normales(num_f,d);
00163                   coo->setIJSilent(i, d, xv(num_f, d));
00164                 }
00165               pfnorm[i]/=face_surfaces(num_f);
00166             }
00167 
00168           double eps = 1e-10;
00169 
00170           MCAuto<DataArrayInt> Idpos = fnorm->findIdsInRange(1-eps,1+eps);
00171           MCAuto<DataArrayInt> Idneg = fnorm->findIdsInRange(-1-eps,-1+eps);
00172 
00173           int n1 = Idpos->getNumberOfTuples();
00174           int n2 = Idneg->getNumberOfTuples();
00175 
00176           if ((n1!=n2) || (n1+n2)!=nbfaces)
00177             {
00178               Cerr << "ERROR : Problem on internal boundary. Cannot associate pairs of faces." << finl;
00179               Process::exit(1);
00180             }
00181           MCAuto<DataArrayDouble> coo_pos = coo->selectByTupleId(*Idpos);
00182           MCAuto<DataArrayDouble> coo_neg = coo->selectByTupleId(*Idneg);
00183 
00184           const int* pIdpos = Idpos->getConstPointer();
00185           const int* pIdneg = Idneg->getConstPointer();
00186 
00187           MCAuto<DataArrayInt> idx = coo_pos->findClosestTupleId(coo_neg);
00188 
00189           const int* pidx = idx->getConstPointer();
00190 
00191           for (int i=0; i<nbfaces/2; i++)
00192             {
00193               int j2 = pIdneg[i];
00194               int k = pidx[i];
00195               int j1 = pIdpos[k];
00196 
00197               face_map_(j1) = j2;
00198               face_map_(j2) = j1;
00199             }
00200         }
00201       cIP->decrRef();
00202       cP->decrRef();
00203     }
00204 #endif
00205 }
00206 
00207 void Champ_front_calc_interne::mettre_a_jour(double temps)
00208 {
00209   Champ_front_calc::mettre_a_jour(temps);
00210 // Swap values (implies a copy)
00211   DoubleTab& tab=valeurs_au_temps(temps);
00212   assert(tab.nb_dim() == 2 && tab.dimension(1) == 1);
00213   DoubleTab tmp(tab);
00214   for (int i = 0; i < tab.dimension(0); i++)
00215     tab(i,0) = tmp(face_map_(i),0);
00216 }
